messages.subject: having fun
messages.msgSnippet: Mark and the kids are out getting milk and bread from the shop for me as I am feeling a little unwell. At least I hope they remember to buy the milk and bread
messages.messageBody:
Mark and the kids are out getting milk and bread from the shop for me as I
am feeling a little unwell. At least I hope they remember to buy the milk
and bread as Mark turns the whole 'going to the shop experience' into a
dangerous mission. So it takes at least 20 minutes to get ready, arming
themselves, finding out from the 'chief' the objective of the mission,
looking out for the enemy on the way......

Kids are great and husbands who haven't forgotten how to play are pretty
awesome too!

Julie
